title: Bamboo USB-C Charging Station for Multiple Devices,60W 6 Port Charing Dock with 3 AC Outlets, 3 USB C, 3 USB A,6.6ft Power Cord for lPhone,lPad,Tablets (6 Mixed Cables Included),Green
description: 【60W USB C Charging Station With 3 AC Outlets】Equipped with 3 widely AC outlets(15A/1875W Max), 3 USB-A ports(5V/2.4A Max)，1 USB-C port(5V/2.4A Max) and 2 PD ports (5V/3A , 9V/2.2A , 12V/1.67A Max),the 60W 6 ports usb c charging station power up 9 devices at the same time.Multi outlet charger station can easily plug in your PC, monitor, printer & more. The multifunctional desktop charging station with bamboo design provide ultimate convenience for your appliances and mobile devices.

top_reviews.title: POWERful
top_reviews.body: I love this power station. The fact that you can arrange pegs to make custom slot is perfect. Holds my iPad Pro with a thick case without any problem. Charges multiple items quickly. You get what you pay for .. this is a great purchase. Read more
